post.author: Hyonchol Kee
post.content:
I have a little bit old servers but it still works very well.
1 Compaq Proliant DL380 PIII 800 Server
1 Compaq Proliant DL 580 Piii Xeon P 700 Server(4 CPU)
and some storage, Firewall Hub,Rack, normal switch Hub, Switch view,
Digital scaler......and some more....

Though I am a Korean, but at the moment my computer doesn't show the Korean, so I am writing in English.
My number is 416-894-3355 and I live in North York.....

Please help me, or introduce who can use these machines...
Great commission will be provided......
post.title: Server to sell
